column4: is the sun-java6-jdk package still available on ubuntu 11.04? i am on 11.10 and I don't see it
Oracle changed the license so it needs manually installing

thanks i ask as I am actually writing my own script in the form of a chef recipe

u r able to get away w/out clicking the license checkbox?
stupid me , i have been storing on my corporate download site

not sure, I use 1.7 from the website, once you accept the licens you can copy the URLs so I put it in a script....
those oracle dorks, i can't find the .tar.gz for linux for jdk6, but i see how u got it for jdk6

no, there is a nasty lucene bug, and my devs use lots of lucene
